general.1: The process encountered an internal error and was unable to complete the request.
general.2: The process encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from completing the request.
general.3: Null arrays cannot be provided to getRandom
general.5: useStorm is not available in this environment.
general.6: The %s function%s must be configured. Please add .%s(<your_function>) before .build() is called.

not_found.1: The requested resource was not found.
not_found.2: The requested resource does not exist.

security.1: The request has been refused due to invalid authorization.

validation.1: The request was not processed due to validation errors.
validation.2: The request was rejected due to validation errors.
validation.3: The server cannot or will not process the request due to a client error.
validation.4: The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed syntax.

unknown.1: The process encountered an unknown issue that prevented it from completing the request.

service_unavailable.1: The server is currently unable to process the request.
service_unavailable.2: The server is currently unable to handle the request due to temporary overloading or maintenance of the server.

action_unsupported.1: The requested action is not supported.
action_unsupported.2: The requested action is not allowed.
